title: Jordanetics now on Audible
author: VD
content_html:
Jordanetics: A Journey Into the Mind of Humanity’s Greatest Thinker is now available on Audible via Amazon. 7 hours and 31 minutes of brutal philosophical analysis.

If you would prefer to go buy directly from the publisher, you can also buy the audiobook at the Arkhaven Store.
